hero.title: IltizamTech
hero.description: Empowering governments and enterprises with AI-driven solutions, SRE excellence, and digital transformation across Saudi Arabia and the UAE.

about.title: About IltizamTech
about.description: Founded in 2023, IltizamTech is a pioneering technology company with headquarters in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and Abu Dhabi, UAE. We specialize in delivering cutting-edge AI solutions, robust Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) services, and comprehensive digital transformation strategies for governments and enterprises.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading technology partner in the Gulf region, driving digital excellence and innovation that transforms how governments and businesses operate in the digital age.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to delivering reliable, intelligent, and scalable technology solutions that empower our clients to achieve operational excellence, enhance citizen services, and drive sustainable growth.

ai.title: AI Solutions
ai.description: Advanced artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions for automation, analytics, and intelligent decision-making.

sre.title: Site Reliability Engineering
sre.description: Comprehensive SRE services ensuring maximum uptime, performance optimization, and scalable infrastructure management.

development.title: Software Development
development.description: Custom software development with modern technologies, from web applications to enterprise systems.

transformation.title: Digital Transformation
transformation.description: End-to-end digital transformation consulting and implementation services for government and enterprise clients.

inspectz.title: InspectZ - AI-Powered Inspection Management System
inspectz.description: A comprehensive inspection management platform that revolutionizes government compliance monitoring through artificial intelligence, real-time analytics, and mobile-first design.

features.title: Key Features:
features.dashboard: Real-time inspection dashboard with Arabic/English support
features.mobile: Mobile inspection interface with voice and camera integration

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.public: Public sector organizations requiring AI solutions
whoWeServe.enterprises: Enterprises looking for SRE and infrastructure optimization
whoWeServe.partners: Organizations needing reliable software development partners

whyChoose.title: Why Choose IltizamTech
whyChoose.expertise: Regional expertise with global technology standards
whyChoose.trackRecord: Proven track record in government and enterprise projects
whyChoose.comprehensive: Comprehensive service portfolio from consulting to implementation
whyChoose.commitment: Commitment to reliability, security, and scalability

footer.description: Shaping reliable & intelligent digital futures for governments and enterprises across Saudi Arabia and the UAE.
